name: vacation-social-media
description: Identifies the most impactful vacation photos for social media by prioritizing unique storytelling and genuine human connection over technical perfection.

categories.name: Post
categories.description: The 'hero' shots: visually stunning, story-driven images with a 'wow' factor that would stop a scroll and command engagement.

categories.name: Stories
categories.description: Engaging but casual shots: fun behind-the-scenes moments and candid vibes that work well for ephemeral sharing or reels.

categories.name: Keep
categories.description: Personal memories: decent quality photos that hold sentimental value for a private collection but lack the impact for public sharing.

categories.name: Skip
categories.description: Low-value files: blurry, unflattering, technical failures, or redundant duplicates that should be discarded.

top_priorities: Genuine human emotion and candid expressions

must_have: Subject matter that tells a specific story of an experience
Visible and genuine facial expressions or body language
highly_valued: Candid laughter and authentic connection between people
Golden hour or dramatic natural lighting
bonus_points: Everyone in a group shot looking their best simultaneously

deal_breakers: Severe overexposure or underexposure where detail is lost
Near-identical duplicates (keep only the best frame)
Utilitarian photos like receipts, menus, or maps without artistic intent
negative_factors: Clich√© or generic compositions that feel 'stock'

specific_guidance: A compelling story or unique moment always trumps technical perfection; prioritize the 'wow' over the sharpness.
When evaluating 'Post' vs 'Stories', ask if the image stands alone as a piece of art or requires context.
Filter out all but the single best shot from any series of similar photos to reduce clutter.
Favor images where the subjects are interacting with each other or the environment rather than looking directly at the lens.
philosophy: Prioritize authentic storytelling and 'wow' moments over technical perfection to curate a feed that feels both spectacular and genuine.
